history.proof: hauto lq: on use: Zp_mult_one, Zp_mult_comm.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0
x: Z_Zp

Goal:
x ⊗ Op = x

Premises:
Notation Op := Zp_one
Zp_mult_one : forall x, Op ⊗ x = x
Zp_mult_comm : forall x y, x ⊗ y = y ⊗ x
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Nat.divide_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.iff_Transitive (exists p : nat, y = p * x) (exists p : nat, y = p * x') (Morphisms_Prop.ex_iff_morphism (fun p : nat => y = p * x) (fun p : nat => y = p * x') (fun p : nat => Morphisms.per_partial_app_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER Nat.eq_equiv) (p * x) (p * x') (Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism Nat.mul_wd (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive p) x x' Hx))) (exists p : nat, y' = p * x') (exists p : nat, y' = p * x') (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (exists p : nat, y' = p * x')) (Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.iff...
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
div_full : forall q p : nat, {n : nat & {r : nat | q = n * p + r /\ (p <> 0 -> r < p)}}
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
rem_diag : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> rem p p = 0
Z_Zp = {x : nat | x < p} : Set
Nat.add_sub_eq_nz : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0 -> n - m = p -> m + p = n
Nat.mul_cancel_r : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p < -> n = m
Nat.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m < -> n = m
Zp_zero = exist (fun x : nat => x < p) 0 ((fun lemma : 0 < p <-> (0 < Z.of_nat p)%Z => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (0 < p) (0 < Z.of_nat p)%Z lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z lt Z.of_nat Z.lt Nat2Z.inj_lt 0 0%Z eq_refl p (Z.of_nat p) eq_refl) (let Hp0 : Z.of_nat p <> 0%Z := ZifyClasses.rew_iff (p <> 0) (Z.of_nat p <> 0%Z) (ZifyClasses.not_morph (p = 0) (Z.of_nat p = 0%Z) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z eq Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) p (Z.of_nat p) eq_refl 0 0%Z eq_refl)) Hp in let cstr : (0 <= Z.of_nat p)%Z := Nat2Z.is_nonneg p in let __arith : forall __x1 : Z, (...
Zp_one = exist (fun x : nat => x < p) (rem 1 p) (div_rem_spec2 1 Hp) : Z_Zp
Nat.div_mod : forall x y : nat, y <> 0 -> x = y * (x / y) + x mod y
Init.Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => fst (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.modulo = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => y' - snd (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.modulo (_ _)%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Init.Nat.add x 1 : positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
div = fun q p : nat => projT1 (div_full q p) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments div (_ _)%nat_scope
bezout_rel_prime : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q}}
div_rem_uniq : forall p n1 r1 n2 r2 : nat, p <> 0 -> n1 * p + r1 = n2 * p + r2 -> r1 < p -> r2 < p -> n1 = n2 /\ r1 = r2
rem = fun q p : nat => proj1_sig (projT2 (div_full q p)) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments rem (_ _)%nat_scope
rem_lt : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall a : nat, a < p -> rem a p = a
Zp_inj : forall x y, proj1_sig x = proj1_sig y -> x = y
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
inj_eq : forall x y : nat, x = y -> Z.of_nat x = Z.of_nat y
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
cmp_sub : forall x y : nat, {z : nat | z + y = x} + {x < y}
Zp_plus_comm : forall x y, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x
Zp_plus_zero : forall x, Zp ⊕ x = x
Zp_minus : forall x, x ⊕ ∸ x = Zp
Pos2Nat.inj : forall p q : positive, Pos.to_nat p = Pos.to_nat q -> p = q
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
Zp_plus_assoc : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z
Nat.add_sub_eq_l : forall n m p : nat, m + p = n -> n - m = p
div_rem_spec2 : forall q p : nat, p <> 0 -> rem q p < p
rem_prop : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> rem q p = r
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}

```coq
destruct x as [x Hx].
unfold Zp_one, Zp_mult.
rewrite Zp_mult_one.
apply Zp_inj.
apply rem_prop.
rewrite rem_lt.
- apply Nat.add_sub_eq_nz. apply Hp.
  apply Nat.add_sub_eq_nz. apply Hp.
  apply Nat.mul_cancel_r.
  + apply Hp.
  + apply Nat.add_sub_eq_l.
    apply ZifyClasses.mkrel.
Qed. Qed.```

original: destruct x as [x Hx]. unfold Zp_one, Zp_mult. rewrite Zp_mult_one. apply Zp_inj. apply rem_prop. rewrite rem_lt. - apply Nat.add_sub_eq_nz. apply Hp. apply Nat.add_sub_eq_nz. apply Hp. apply Nat.mul_cancel_r. + apply Hp. + apply Nat.add_sub_eq_l. apply ZifyClasses.mkrel.
